import React, {useState, useEffect} from 'react' import styles from '../../styles/Menu.module.scss' import { Link } from 'react-scroll' import HamburguerButton from '../Hamburguer/HamburguerButton' function Menu(props){ const [menuNav, setMenuNav] = useState(false) useEffect = (() => { const changeBackground = () => { console.log(window.scrollY) if(window.scrollY >= 90){ setMenuNav(true) } else { setMenuNav(false) } } window.addEventListener('scroll', changeBackground) }, []); return( <>
  • HOME
  • ACERCA
  • CATEGORIAS
  • CLIENTES
) } export default Menu
